mapper.select: SELECT profile_img_nm AS profileImgNm ,profile_origin_file_nm AS profileOriginFileNm ,profile_img_file_path AS profileImgFilePath FROM adin_user WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE adin_user SET use_yn = '0' ,modify_dt = now() WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adin_secession_reason (reason, email, create_dt, modify_dt) VALUES (#{reason}, #{email}, now(), now())
